E-Mail Messages
Date: Tuesday, 4/1/1987
Subject: Retirement
Hi Chief,
I think my time is running out. This will be
my last season as a professional ballplayer.

Sincerely,
Allen Nunnery



Date: Friday, 5/2/1987
Subject: William Nordberg learns new position
William Nordberg has made noteable progress
learning his new position, Third Base.
I would rate his skills as "B" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director



Date: Wednesday, 5/21/1987
Subject: Extension?
Hello Sir,
Are you interested in negotiating a contract extension?
You know, I'm in my final year. I'd like to stay here!

Sincerely,
Joe Davis



Date: Sunday, 6/1/1987
Subject: Robert Landau learns new position
Robert Landau has made noteable progress
learning his new position, Leftfield.
I would rate his skills as "E" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director



Date: Tuesday, 7/1/1987
Subject: Contract extension
Hello,
I just wanted to let you know that I'm
in my last year of the contract.
Are you interested in giving me an extension?
I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
Domenic Hallowell



Date: Thursday, 7/24/1987
Subject: Leonard Gittens learns new position

learning his new position, Centerfield.
I would rate his skills as "E" right now.

Regards,
